name: Espresso
description: Brazilian single bean origin. A mellow yet nutty flavor typical of a dark roast.

name: Latte
description: Like your coffee a little sweeter? Try this delicious cafe latte. Foam, steamed milk, and espresso with optional syrups.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Like your coffee sweet and cold? Try our popular iced coffee. Milk, ice, drip or espresso, and syrup. Optional foam and drizzle of your choice.

name: Americano
description: The classic Americano. No explantion needed. Hot water and espresso.

name: Bagel
description: Artisan-style with a choice of Plain, Everything, Cinnamon Raisin, Blueberry, Chocolate Chip, Asiago, Poppy Seed, Egg, Garlic, or Sesame

name: Donut
description: Choice of Original Glazed, Powder, Chocolate Sprinkle, Cream Filled, Jelly Filled, Boston Cream, Apple Fritter, or Bear Claw

name: Croissant
description: Our beautifully crispy yet soft and buttery croissant is rolled and baked every morning.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
description: Our savory sandwiches. Choices: Sausage, egg, and cheese bagel; Bacon, egg, and cheese croissant; Breakfast BLT.

name: Cupcake
description: Delectable and rich. Choice of Vanilla, Chocolate, Red Velvet, Fresh Strawberry, Maple Pumpkin, or Lemon Blueberry.

name: Macaron
description: Sweet and scrumptious. Choice of Chocolate and Nutella, Pistachio and White Chocolate, Salted Caramel, Meyer Lemon, or Mango.
